snippet.title: ABZÛ E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
ABZÛ launches on August 2nd for PS4 and PC. 

ABZÛ is an epic descent into the depths of the sea where players explore beautifully rendered ocean environments with fluid swimming controls. In ABZÛ, the user embarks on a nonviolent, 3rd person adventure with no fail states so users can’t die. They can only explore and discover new things about the underwater world as they progress along the emotional spectrum of the game.

Find out more about ABZÛ
www.abzugame.com/
https://twitter.com/abzugame
https://www.facebook.com/abzugame

For behind the scenes details on all of 505's games, head to the official 505 Games Blog: http://www.505games.com/blog
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/505Games
Twitter: https://twitter.com/505_Games
